verses.verse: The burden <S%H4853><s%> of Egypt: <S%H4714><s%> "Behold, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh rides <S%H7392><s%> on a swift <S%H7031><s%> cloud, <S%H5645><s%> and comes <S%H935><s%> to Egypt. <S%H4714><s%> The idols <S%H457><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> will tremble <S%H5128><s%> at his presence; <S%H6440><s%> and the heart <S%H3824><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> will melt <S%H4549><s%> in its midst. <S%H7130><s%>

I will stir <S%H5526><s%> up the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> against the Egyptians, <S%H4714><s%> and they will fight <S%H3898><s%> everyone <S%H376><s%> against his brother, <S%H251><s%> and everyone <S%H376><s%> against his neighbor; <S%H7453><s%> city <S%H5892><s%> against city, <S%H5892><s%> and kingdom <S%H4467><s%> against kingdom. <S%H4467><s%>

The spirit <S%H7307><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> will fail <S%H1238><s%> in its midst. <S%H7130><s%> I will destroy <S%H1104><s%> its counsel. <S%H6098><s%> They will seek <S%H1875><s%> the idols, <S%H457><s%> the charmers, <S%H328><s%> those who have familiar spirits, <S%H178><s%> and the wizards. <S%H3049><s%>

I <S%H853><s%> will give over <S%H5534><s%> the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of a cruel <S%H7186><s%> lord. <S%H113><s%> A fierce <S%H5794><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> will rule <S%H4910><s%> over them, <S%H5002><s%>" says the Lord, <S%H113><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies. <S%H6635><s%>
The waters <S%H4325><s%> will fail <S%H5405><s%> from the sea, <S%H3220><s%> and the river <S%H5104><s%> will be wasted <S%H2717><s%> and become dry. <S%H3001><s%>

The rivers <S%H5104><s%> will become <S%H2186><s%> foul. <S%H2186><s%> The streams <S%H2975><s%> of Egypt <S%H4693><s%> will be diminished <S%H1809><s%> and dried up. <S%H2717><s%> The reeds <S%H7070><s%> and flags <S%H5488><s%> will wither away. <S%H7060><s%>

The meadows <S%H6169><s%> by the Nile, <S%H2975><s%> by the brink <S%H6310><s%> of the Nile, <S%H2975><s%> and all the sown <S%H4218><s%> fields of the Nile, <S%H2975><s%> will become dry, <S%H3001><s%> be driven away, <S%H5086><s%> and be no more.

The fishermen <S%H1771><s%> will lament, <S%H578><s%> and all those who <S%H7993><s%> fish <S%H2443><s%> in the Nile <S%H2975><s%> will mourn, <S%H56><s%> and those who spread <S%H6566><s%> nets <S%H4365><s%> on <S%H6440><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> will languish. <S%H535><s%>
Moreover those who work <S%H5647><s%> in combed <S%H8305><s%> flax, <S%H6593><s%> and those who weave <S%H707><s%> white cloth, <S%H2355><s%> will be confounded. <S%H954><s%>
The pillars <S%H8356><s%> will be broken <S%H1792><s%> in pieces. <S%H6213><s%> All those who work for hire <S%H7938><s%> will be grieved <S%H99><s%> in soul. <S%H5315><s%>

The princes <S%H8269><s%> of Zoan <S%H6814><s%> are utterly foolish. <S%H191><s%> The counsel <S%H6098><s%> of the wisest <S%H2450><s%> counselors <S%H3289><s%> of Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> has become stupid. <S%H1197><s%> How do you say <S%H559><s%> to Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> "I am the son <S%H1121><s%> of the wise, <S%H2450><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of ancient <S%H6924><s%> kings? <S%H4428><s%>"

Where <S%H335><s%> then <S%H645><s%> are your wise <S%H2450><s%> men? <S%H5046><s%> Let them tell you now; <S%H3045><s%> and let them know what Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies <S%H6635><s%> has purposed <S%H3289><s%> concerning Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

The princes <S%H8269><s%> of Zoan <S%H6814><s%> have become fools. <S%H2973><s%> The princes <S%H8269><s%> of Memphis <S%H5297><s%> are deceived. <S%H5377><s%> They have caused Egypt <S%H4714><s%> to go astray, <S%H8582><s%> who are the cornerstone <S%H6438><s%> of her tribes. <S%H7626><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has mixed <S%H4537><s%> a spirit <S%H7307><s%> of perverseness <S%H5773><s%> in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of her; <S%H4714><s%> and they have caused Egypt to go astray <S%H8582><s%> in all of its works, <S%H4639><s%> like a drunken <S%H7910><s%> man staggers <S%H8582><s%> in his vomit. <S%H6892><s%>
Neither shall there be any work <S%H4639><s%> for Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> which head <S%H7218><s%> or tail, <S%H2180><s%> palm branch <S%H3712><s%> or rush, <S%H100><s%> may do. <S%H6213><s%>

In that day <S%H3117><s%> the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> will be like women. <S%H802><s%> They will tremble <S%H2729><s%> and fear <S%H6342><s%> because <S%H6440><s%> of the shaking <S%H8573><s%> of the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies, <S%H6635><s%> which he shakes over them. <S%H5130><s%>

The land <S%H127><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> will become a terror <S%H2283><s%> to Egypt. <S%H4714><s%> Everyone to whom mention <S%H2142><s%> is made of it will be afraid, <S%H6342><s%> because <S%H6440><s%> of the plans <S%H6098><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies, <S%H6635><s%> which he determines against it. <S%H3289><s%>

In that day, <S%H3117><s%> there will be five <S%H2568><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> that speak <S%H1696><s%> the language <S%H8193><s%> of Canaan, <S%H3667><s%> and swear <S%H7650><s%> to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies. <S%H6635><s%> One <S%H259><s%> will be called <S%H559><s%> "The city <S%H5892><s%> of destruction. <S%H2041><s%>"

In that day, <S%H3117><s%> there will be an altar <S%H4196><s%> to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and a pillar <S%H4676><s%> to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> at <S%H681><s%> its border. <S%H1366><s%>

It will be for a sign <S%H226><s%> and for a witness <S%H5707><s%> to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies <S%H6635><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt; <S%H4714><s%> for they will cry <S%H6817><s%> to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> because <S%H6440><s%> of oppressors, <S%H3905><s%> and he will send <S%H7971><s%> them a savior <S%H3467><s%> and a defender, <S%H7227><s%> and he will deliver them. <S%H5337><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will be known <S%H3045><s%> to Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> will know <S%H3045><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> in that day. <S%H3117><s%> Yes, <S%H5647><s%> they will worship with sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> and offering, <S%H4503><s%> and will vow <S%H5088><s%> a vow <S%H5087><s%> to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and will perform it. <S%H7999><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will strike <S%H5062><s%> Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> striking <S%H5062><s%> and healing. <S%H7495><s%> They will return <S%H7725><s%> to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and he will be entreated <S%H6279><s%> by them, <S%H7495><s%> and will heal them.

In that day <S%H3117><s%> there will be a highway <S%H4546><s%> out of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> to Assyria, <S%H804><s%> and the Assyrian <S%H804><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> into Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and the Egyptian <S%H4714><s%> into Assyria; <S%H804><s%> and the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> will worship <S%H5647><s%> with the Assyrians. <S%H804><s%>

In that day, <S%H3117><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> will be the third <S%H7992><s%> with Egypt <S%H4714><s%> and with Assyria, <S%H804><s%> a blessing <S%H1293><s%> in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of the earth; <S%H776><s%>

because Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies <S%H6635><s%> has blessed <S%H1288><s%> them, <S%H559><s%> saying, "Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be Egypt <S%H4714><s%> my people, <S%H5971><s%> Assyria <S%H804><s%> the work <S%H4639><s%> of my hands, <S%H3027><s%> and Israel <S%H3478><s%> my inheritance. <S%H5159><s%>"
